attributes.action: allow all sixth form attenders free transport to and from school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: College and University students have free transport passes to allow them free travel to and from their place of study. However, sixth formers (as far as I know) do not have this privelige. This is unfair as we are furthering our education much like fellow students, but we have to pay for our transport.
